name: Cekura
headline: Keep support, marketing, and sales materials up-to-date
description: Cekura is an AI web agent that ensures SaaS product documentation stays up-to-date. We help knowledge and customer success teams save 100+ hours per week.

founders.name: Jialiang (JZ) Zhou, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and CEO of Cekura. Graduated this year from Brown with a computer science degree. Founded a consumer startup back in college for thrifting.

Music producer and rapper in my past life.

founders.name: Blake Shao, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CTO of Cekura (F24). Recent Brown CS grad, took a consumer AI startup for 0 to 1 as a founding engineer, and won festivals as a filmmaker before startup.

generated_description:
**Cekura: Keeping Your SaaS Documentation Fresh**

Cekura is a bright new player in the tech scene, founded in 2024 and proudly part of Y Combinator Batch F24. With a simple yet ambitious mission, Cekura aims to keep support, marketing, and sales materials up-to-date, focusing on easing the burdens of knowledge and customer success teams. Think of them as an AI web agent devoted to ensuring your SaaS product documentation never goes stale.

Operating out of a small but mighty team of two, Cekura leverages artificial intelligence to save companies over 100 hours per week in documentation upkeep. This is particularly beneficial for organizations drowning in the rapid pace of change; it allows them to focus more on growth and less on admin legwork.

The crux of what Cekura offers is automated documentation maintenance. Users can send their existing documentation as-is, and Cekura's smart agents work silently in the background, validating the content against the live product. This means immediate visibility into what’s current and what needs fixing, with helpful tools like actionable summaries and session replays making life easier for everyone involved.

Diana Hu acts as the guiding hand as the group partner, but the spirit of Cekura is that of agility and innovation. Their approach is straightforward: if you’re navigating the complexities of SaaS product support, Cekura has your back.

In a tech landscape that can often feel bloated and overwhelming, Cekura stands out as a refreshing solution that brings clarity and efficiency to knowledge management. Whether you're in customer success or looking to streamline support efforts, Cekura is definitely worth a look.

For more information, you can visit their website at [Cekura.io](https://www.cekura.io) or reach out directly at founders@cekura.io.
